mapper.insert: insert into operate_log (operate_user, operate_time, class_name, method_name, method_params, return_value, cost_time) values (UUID_TO_BIN(#{operateUser}), #{operateTime}, #{className}, #{methodName}, #{methodParams}, #{returnValue}, #{costTime})

insert into select_log (operate_user, operate_time, class_name, method_name, method_params, cost_time) values (UUID_TO_BIN(#{operateUser}), #{operateTime}, #{className}, #{methodName}, #{methodParams}, #{costTime})
insert into login_log (operate_time,operate_user, return_value, cost_time) values (#{operateTime},#{operateUser}, #{returnValue}, #{costTime})
insert into error_log (id, time, message,stack, stack_trace) values (null,#{operateTime},#{message},#{stack},#{stackTrace});
